objectives: Apply learned vocabulary in conversations about hobbies and interests
Compare different perspectives on hobbies and interests

multiple_intelligences.linguistic: Write a story or essay about hobbies and interests
multiple_intelligences.logical_mathematical: Analyze patterns and create logical arguments about hobbies and interests
multiple_intelligences.spatial: Create visual representations or mind maps of hobbies and interests
multiple_intelligences.bodily_kinesthetic: Role-play or act out scenarios related to hobbies and interests
multiple_intelligences.musical: Create a song or rhythm exercise about hobbies and interests
multiple_intelligences.interpersonal: Collaborate in groups to discuss hobbies and interests
multiple_intelligences.intrapersonal: Reflect individually on personal connection to hobbies and interests
multiple_intelligences.naturalistic: Categorize and classify concepts related to hobbies and interests

content.basic: Simplified texts and basic vocabulary about hobbies and interests
content.intermediate: Standard complexity materials with support about hobbies and interests
content.advanced: Complex authentic materials and academic texts about hobbies and interests

process.grouping: Individual, pairs, small groups, or whole class based on preference
process.choice: Multiple activity options aligned with learning style

differentiation.environment: Open space allowing movement and hands-on activities

warm_up.description: Students move around and interact physically related to hobbies and interests
warm_up.materials: Space for movement, props if needed

main_activities.description: Students receive information about hobbies and interests through kinesthetic modality
Students practice language related to hobbies and interests using kinesthetic approach
Students produce original content about hobbies and interests demonstrating intermediate thinking

discussion_prompts: How does hobbies and interests affect people?
What are the advantages and disadvantages of hobbies and interests?
How would you solve problems related to hobbies and interests?

vocabulary_support.tier_2: Academic and topic-specific words for hobbies and interests
vocabulary_support.tier_3: Domain-specific technical terms related to hobbies and interests

homework_options.required: Core assignment at intermediate level using kinesthetic approach

teacher_notes.grouping_suggestions: Flexible grouping based on readiness and interest
teacher_notes.time_management: Build in flexibility for different pacing needs

common_difficulties: Students may lack background knowledge about hobbies and interests
Vocabulary may be challenging for some students
Some students may need more processing time
methodology: UDL + Differentiated Instruction + CLT + Multiple Intelligences
references: CAST Universal Design for Learning Guidelines
